Reading for Writing

The Reading for Writing Style Guide is a fill-in-the-blank Google Doc that helps you identify key aspects of writing in a certain field and guides you through the process of creating your own writing guide. Click here to get started!

See an example

Example Style Guides

These are examples of exemplary style guides for different disciplines. If you get stuck as you complete your own style guide, feel free use these for inspiration. Check back soon for more examples!

Style Guide: Psychology
